updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #MarinaBay towards #Bishan are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #MarinaBay to #Bishan towards JurongEast due to train fault.
[NSL]UPDATE:Free buses ceased at 12pm. Affected passengers can go to any SMRT station from now till 26Feb for refund.
[NSL]UPDATE:Free buses at affected stations to continue until further notice.
[NSL]UPDATE: Northbound service from Marina Bay to Toa Payoh has resumed. Free buses to continue until further notice.
[NSL]UPDATE:Affected passengers can take free buses from designated bus stops,NEL from Dhoby Ghaut or CCL at Marina Bay or Dhoby Ghaut.
[NSL]UPDATE: Northbound service from Marina Bay to Toa Payoh expected to resume at 11.25am.
[NSL]UPDATE:Service from Marina Bay to Toa Payoh expected to resume in 1hr.Affected passengers can take free buses, CCL or NEL.
[NSL]UPDATE: No northbound service from Marina Bay to Toa Payoh. Free bus services at affected stations.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travel time between #MarinaBay and #Woodlands due an incident at Newton station.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free public & shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between #ToaPayoh and #Newton.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimated 30 mins additional travelling time between #MarinaBay and #Woodlands due an incident at Newton station.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimated 25 mins additional travel time between #Newton and #MarinaBay due to an incident at Newton station.
[NSL]: Estimated 30 mins additional travelling time between #MarinaBay and #Woodlands due to an incident at Newton station.
[NSL] UPDATE Train service from Bishan to Marina Bay now operating normally
[NSL]UPDATE Train fault cleared. Expect longer travelling time from Bishan to Marina Bay. Trains and platforms may be crowded.
[NSL]Estimated 10mins additional travelling time from Bishan toward Marina Bay due to train fault
